existing_features.title: Add a splash page that appears on first app load and prominently displays the text "TV STREAMING NETWORK" before the user reaches the existing Home view.

Provide a clear action on the splash page to continue into the app (navigate to the existing Home view) and ensure the splash page does not block access to admin sign-in and the Manage Videos view once the user continues.
Update the appâ€™s view/state flow to support a new initial "splash" view and hide the existing TopNav while the splash page is active.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a splash page displaying 'TV STREAMING NETWORK'
